properties.address: Largo do Paço and Rua do Mercado
properties.notes: “The market in this plaza is divided into three parts; the center for vegetables, birds, eggs, etc. the side along the sea for fresh and salted fish; the side on the streets for cereals, beans, flour, and onions. The four corners of the square, on the road side have residences, and on the sea side have taverns.  On the corner of Rua do Mercado and Rua do Ouvidor is a pasture house; and on the Largo do Paço is a tavern. And Mr. Paulo Felizardo Cabral e Silva, a prosecutor of the Candelaria district has an office at n. 31in this plaza. There is also a municipal guard in this same plaza.”
